com.skysql.java

Class Logging

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skysql.java.Logging

  • public class Logging
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle the centralized logging. This class sends messages to the syslog or rsyslog daemon, with configurable parameters. By default, the syslog daemon listens on the port 514, udp protocol. Being a singleton, an application does not need to redefine its parameters until it shuts down.
    Author:
    Massimo Siani

      • setComponent

        public static Logging setComponent(java.lang.String component)
        Set the component that is logging. The default value is an empty string. The string will be part of the prefix string: MariaDB-Manager-(component): [random number]
        Parameters:
        component - the component, ie Monitor, WebUI.
        Returns:
        the instance of the class
